scripts.build:full: npx tsc && node build.js && cp dist/*.com.js ..
scripts.build:fuller: npx tsc && node build.js && npx dts-bundle-generator -o dist/mykronos.com.d.ts src/mykronos.com.ts && cp dist/mykronos.com.js ../mykronos.com.js
scripts.build:full:watch: npm run build:watch & watch -n 1 npm run build:full && echo 'done'
